keyword: calories in an egg and sausage mcmuffin
title: Calories in an Egg and Sausage McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in an egg and sausage mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and quick variations for your McDonald's breakfast.
h1: Calories in an Egg and Sausage McMuffin
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg; includes English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; standard serving size (~150 g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on standard McDonald's data. Check app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: An egg and sausage McMuffin contains about 480 calories and 21 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in an egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 calories for the standard McDonald's version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per mcmuffin.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in an egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, around 30 g of carbs, mostly from the English muffin.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Roughly 830 mg, mainly from the sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, skip the cheese or use egg whites to reduce calories by 50â€“100.
